name: You (Can)Not Survive
description:
Alas, but you not the last survivor of the recent zombie Apocalypse. Or was it not a zombie Apocalypse? The choice you have is not big, to die or survive at any cost.

  • An zombie shooter action game with elements of RPG.
  • Under your control one character under direct control.
  • Additional you control a squad that executing your commands through indirect control.
  • The character possesses stats which improve over time, based on your game actions.
  • Split and improve your things by means of ability to engineering.
  • Get experience, collect valuable parts and spend them for weapons, medicines and useful devices. All this will be used against thousands of enemies that you will meet on your way.
  • Huge base of weapon, including flame throwers, grenade launchers, rifles, hand guns, plasma guns and more others.
  • Enemies become stronger and stronger. They can use a huge range of abilities.
  • You will Fight against bosses with dangerous abilities. But also you will receive for it a deserved reward.
  • Reach safe areas, perform tasks, make team, equip your character, defend positions and advance to your goal.
  • Are you will Uncover the secret of the Apocalypse?
